类 ScoreManager

java.lang.Object
com.shapeville.logic.ScoreManager
public class ScoreManager extends Object
Manages the user's score and progress within the Shapeville application session. Calculates points based on task attempts and provides feedback. Interacts with the NavigationBar to display updated scores.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    ScoreManager()
    Constructs a new ScoreManager and resets the session score and task count.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • ScoreManager

      public ScoreManager()
      Constructs a new ScoreManager and resets the session score and task count.

  • 方法详细资料

    • setNavigationBar

      public void setNavigationBar(NavigationBar navigationBar)
      Sets the NavigationBar instance to allow updating the UI with score changes.
      参数:
      navigationBar - The NavigationBar instance.

    • calculatePoints

      public int calculatePoints(int attemptsUsed, boolean isAdvancedTask)
      Calculates points earned for a task based on the number of attempts used and task type. Points are awarded according to the scoring table in the project specification.
      参数:
      attemptsUsed - The number of attempts the user took to answer correctly (1 to 3).
      isAdvancedTask - True if the task is an advanced task (KS2 Bonus), false for basic tasks.
      返回:
      The number of points earned.

    • recordScoreAndFeedback

      public void recordScoreAndFeedback(int pointsToAdd)
      Records the points earned and displays a feedback message to the user. Only adds points and shows feedback if pointsToAdd is greater than 0. Updates the UI after recording the score.
      参数:
      pointsToAdd - The number of points to add to the current score.

    • incrementTaskTypeCompletedCount

      public void incrementTaskTypeCompletedCount()
      Increments the count of completed task types within the current session. Updates the UI after incrementing the count.

    • getCurrentScore

      public int getCurrentScore()
      Gets the current total score of the user in the session.
      返回:
      The current score.

    • getTasksOfTypeCompletedCount

      public int getTasksOfTypeCompletedCount()
      Gets the count of distinct task types completed in the current session.
      返回:
      The number of completed task types.

    • resetSession

      public void resetSession()
      Resets the current score and the completed task type count to zero. Also updates the UI if the navigation bar is set.
